# datalen

**Instance Property**

The number of bytes of data used to describe the packet.

## Declaration

```swift
u_int32_t datalen;
```

## Fields

- **type**: The type of identifier data (i.e. ETHER_DESC_ETYPE2)
- **data**: A pointer to an entry of type (i.e. pointer to 0x0800).
